metadata.title: CVE-2020-9428 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.1, 3.0.0 to 3.0.8, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.14, the EAPdissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-eap.cby using more careful sscanf parsing.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
